attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned have lost confidence in the Government to effectively deal with the problems the country currently faces.

Its inaction in stimulating job creation, reducing pressure on businesses, initialting rocketing taxes which are penalising the most vulnerable people, selling off the NHS, initiating cuts in the military and Police force that will make the UK vulnerable.

We recommend a vote of non-confidence or a refferendum to vote on non-confidence of the government.
